Toggle Menu

salt.states.modjk

State to control Apache modjk

worker_activated

Syntax

salt.states.modjk.worker_activated(
								name,
								workers=None,
								profile='default'
								)

Details

Activate all the workers in the modjk load balancer

Example:

loadbalancer:
  modjk.worker_activated:
    - workers:
      - app1
      - app2

worker_disabled

Syntax

salt.states.modjk.worker_disabled(
								name,
								workers=None,
								profile='default'
								)

Details

Disable all the workers in the modjk load balancer

Example:

loadbalancer:
  modjk.worker_disabled:
    - workers:
      - app1
      - app2

worker_recover

Syntax

salt.states.modjk.worker_recover(
								name,
								workers=None,
								profile='default'
								)

Details

Recover all the workers in the modjk load balancer

Example:

loadbalancer:
  modjk.worker_recover:
    - workers:
      - app1
      - app2

worker_stopped

Syntax

salt.states.modjk.worker_stopped(
								name,
								workers=None,
								profile='default'
								)

Details

Stop all the workers in the modjk load balancer

Example:

loadbalancer:
  modjk.worker_stopped:
    - workers:
      - app1
      - app2
